c74object.name: sdt.modal
c74object.description: sdt.modal is a resonator implemented according to modal synthesis: i.e. a set of parallel mass–spring–damper mechanical oscillators, each of which represents a mode of resonance of the object.

metadatalist.metadata: Stefano Delle Monache, Stefano Baldan, Stefano Papetti

objarg.name: Unique_ID-obj2
objarg.digest: Mandatory: Unique ID name set for the sdt.inertial object.

objarg.name: Modes
objarg.digest: Mandatory: Number of the available modes.

objarg.name: Pickup-points
objarg.digest: Mandatory: Number of the available pickup points.

attribute.name: freqs
attribute.digest: Frequency of each mode, in Hz.

attribute.name: decays
attribute.digest: Decay of each mode, in seconds.

attribute.name: fragmentSize
attribute.digest: Fraction of the whole object. Used by control layer algorithms to simulate fragmentation [0.0, 1.0].

attribute.name: activeModes
attribute.digest: Number of currently active modes out of all the available ones.

attribute.name: pickup
attribute.digest: Modal weights for each pickup, in 1/Kg, starting from pickup0, pickup1, ..., pickupN.
